content: Hear this word that the LORD has spoken against you, O children of Israel, against the whole family which I brought up from the land of Egypt:

Proclaim on the fortresses in Ashdod (Philistia) and on the citadels in the land of Egypt, and say, “Assemble yourselves on the mountains of Samaria, and see the great confusion within her and the oppressions  abuse of authority in her midst.
For they do not know how to do right,” says the LORD, “these who store up violence and devastation [like treasures] in their strongholds.”
Therefore, thus says the Lord GOD,
